WeatherBench 2 Integration

This platform integrates real data and methodologies from WeatherBench 2, the leading benchmark for data-driven weather forecasting models. Regional evaluation focuses on climate-sensitive areas where model performance varies significantly due to local geographic and meteorological factors.

Datasets:

Models:

RMSE, ACC, CRPS, SEEPS
